name: Wloczykij
overview: Włóczykij is a side-scrolling platform game similar to Dizzy. The main character is reminiscent of an egg. The main way to get around is jumping. The player's task is to collect twelve capsules with the passengers of the crashed spaceship at each stage before time runs out. Moving enemies can be killed by jumping on their heads. Contact with enemies in a different way means instant death and return to the beginning of the stage. The game features five levels.
